Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus, the letter of Ptolemaios, son of Pyyrhos, to Pankrates, of which there remain but five lines, the fifth of which bears wishes of good health which induces us to believe that we are dealing here with a "long-lined letter".
